name: Zombie As One
description:
Zombie As One Conquer the city as a ZOMBIE ARMY

Start as one, become 100 and see how large your army can get.  Look out for the police, they will be armed.

Controls: W or Lmb to move forward, Space or Rmb to flee (Spread out and run faster).

Made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jame 2022.2
